text: lasith malingage pita pita kadulu thrithwaya (hat trik) wartha wuye me awasthawediya.46 wani oowaraye dewani, thewani ha siwuwani panduwaladi michal jonsan panduwa kelinma kadulle wadimenda, jon hastings kadulla muwa karaminda, sewiyar doharti panduwa kelinma kadulle wadimenda dawi giya athara â€˜batin pawar pleâ€™ krida kalaya atharathura wartha wu me mangala â€˜hat trikâ€™ hapankama malingage thewani jathyanthara ekdina pita pita kadulu thrithwaya wiya.malinga oowara 8k yawamin lakunu 35kata kadulu 3ka pandu yawimak satahan kala athara min oowara dekak ma lakunu laba nodun oowara wiya.

parajayata path kala koti sanwidhanaye sithum pathum anuwa katayuthu karana wiwidha kandayam muhudin ethera ha rata athule sita ema sanwidhanayata uda gedi demin janapathi pramukha ranawiruwan jathyanthara yuda adhikaranaya wetha gena yamata darana uthsahaya parajaya kirimata mulu rata ma ekama janathawak lesa katayuthu kala yuthuwa athayi saukhya amathi maithripala sirisena mahatha pawasayi.apa rata thrasthawadayen beragena, nidahas ratak lesa idiriyata gaman karamin sitina awasthawaka eksath jathinge sanwidhanaye maha lekam ban ki mun mahatha nikuth kala upadeshana warthawe sandahan kara athi karunu siyalla shri lanka rajaya prathikshepa karana bawa da amathiwaraya pawasiya.amathiwaraya mese pawasuwe nawa wasare saukhya amathyanshaye katayuthu aarambha kirima nimiththen ema amathyanshaye pereda (18) pawathi uthsawayata sahabhagi wemini.
